title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 485.8 - Application for family-type homes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 485.8 - Application for family-type homes

State Regulations

Application to establish and operate a family-type home for
adults shall be submitted to the commissioner of the local social services
district in which the proposed facility is located, and shall be in accordance
with the requirements of section
489.4
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
485.8

Amended

New

York State Register December 11, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 50, eff. 1/1/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
